verbose_text: Furthermore, after the RAW264.7 cells were made apoptotic, the results of western blotting revealed that Sirt1 expression was increased when cells were incubated with 12.5 muM RSV and 5 mM NAM compared with that of 50 muM RSV and 20 mM NAM, respectively (both P < 0.05 vs. control) (XREF_FIG).
